issue.title: [C++] ReadaheadGenerator cannot be safely copied/moved
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13139](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13139). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The readahead generator is one of the older generators and it isn't using the newer style of encapsulating all of its state within a state struct & shared_ptr.  As a result, if it is copied or moved, then the result is unpredictable.
